text: 07 Mar 2025 Swoon-Worthy Romances for Fans of Your Fault If Your Fault had you hooked with its heartfelt romance and unforgettable characters, get ready to swoon! These love stories deliver all the passion, tension, and emotional depth you crave. Whether you love slow-burn chemistry, star-crossed lovers, or heart-melting moments, these romances will keep you turning pages late into the night! Another Powerplay by Alexa Padgett Release Date: March 3 2025 He’s ice, she’s warmth. When fate locks a nurse and a hockey star together, sparks fly. Join Lennon and Vivian in a heart-pounding romance full of secrets, second chances, and love that melts the coldest hearts. (Brooding player, fierce nurse & loyal dogs included.) One-click now! Buy on Amazon The One Who’s Too Perfect (Lizzy Finds the One Book 2) by Sofie Daves Release Date: March 2 2025 Lizzy is the queen of self-sabotage, expertly blowing up her own love life before it even gets off the ground. Until she finds The One, she dates all the wrong ones—like James, the too-perfect NFL star who makes fake dating feel way too real. But ruining a good thing is kinda her superpower… and if anyone can turn perfect into a disaster, it’s her. Buy on Amazon A City of Hearts and Feathers (The Order of Anubis Book 1) by Amy Kuivalainen Release Date: February 11 2025 Zoe inherited more than a bookstore in Istanbul—she inherited dark magic, dangerous secrets, and a man who makes her heart race. She thought he killed her father. Now he’s her immortal protector, and she can’t stop thinking about his wicked smile. But with everyone hunting the mysterious codex, can she trust him? Buy on Amazon Three Reckless Words by Nicole Snow Release Date: February 25 2025 I thought going full runaway bride would be the hard part. Then I met Archer Rory. Big daddy vibes. Bossy billionaire. Surprise protector. Soon, it’s all sparks and hungry eyes. We’re so wrong for each other I could scream. But every day we’re drifting closer to those three reckless words. Will it be heaven or heartbreak once they slip out? Buy on Amazon Full Throttle (The Bikers of Boston Series Book 1) by GiGi Meier Release Date: February 28 2025 She’s teaching him chemistry—in and out of the classroom. Diego Kahale is coasting toward graduation until a hot pink biker sends his world spinning. The real shock? His mystery racer is none other than his off-limits professor, Isabella Rossi. Their attraction is electric, their connection explosive—will crossing the line cost them everything? Buy on Amazon Wild Side by Elsie Silver Release Date: March 4 2025 I’d always dreamed of my wedding day. But not like this. Not looking into the eyes of the man who betrayed me. But when my nephew’s guardianship is contested, I decide I’ll do whatever it takes to keep him in Rose Hill. Even if it means marrying the enemy. Buy on Amazon meghan Recommended Posts
html:
07 Mar 2025

Swoon-Worthy Romances for Fans of Your Fault

If Your Fault had you hooked with its heartfelt romance and unforgettable characters, get ready to swoon! These love stories deliver all the passion, tension, and emotional depth you crave. Whether you love slow-burn chemistry, star-crossed lovers, or heart-melting moments, these romances will keep you turning pages late into the night!

Another Powerplay

by Alexa Padgett

Release Date: March 3 2025

He’s ice, she’s warmth. When fate locks a nurse and a hockey star together, sparks fly. Join Lennon and Vivian in a heart-pounding romance full of secrets, second chances, and love that melts the coldest hearts. (Brooding player, fierce nurse & loyal dogs included.) One-click now!

Buy on Amazon

The One Who’s Too Perfect (Lizzy Finds the One Book 2)

by Sofie Daves

Release Date: March 2 2025

Lizzy is the queen of self-sabotage, expertly blowing up her own love life before it even gets off the ground. Until she finds The One, she dates all the wrong ones—like James, the too-perfect NFL star who makes fake dating feel way too real. But ruining a good thing is kinda her superpower… and if anyone can turn perfect into a disaster, it’s her.

Buy on Amazon

A City of Hearts and Feathers (The Order of Anubis Book 1)

by Amy Kuivalainen

Release Date: February 11 2025

Zoe inherited more than a bookstore in Istanbul—she inherited dark magic, dangerous secrets, and a man who makes her heart race. She thought he killed her father. Now he’s her immortal protector, and she can’t stop thinking about his wicked smile. But with everyone hunting the mysterious codex, can she trust him?

Buy on Amazon

Three Reckless Words

by Nicole Snow

Release Date: February 25 2025

I thought going full runaway bride would be the hard part. Then I met Archer Rory. Big daddy vibes. Bossy billionaire. Surprise protector. Soon, it’s all sparks and hungry eyes. We’re so wrong for each other I could scream. But every day we’re drifting closer to those three reckless words. Will it be heaven or heartbreak once they slip out?

Buy on Amazon

Full Throttle (The Bikers of Boston Series Book 1)

by GiGi Meier

Release Date: February 28 2025

She’s teaching him chemistry—in and out of the classroom. Diego Kahale is coasting toward graduation until a hot pink biker sends his world spinning. The real shock? His mystery racer is none other than his off-limits professor, Isabella Rossi. Their attraction is electric, their connection explosive—will crossing the line cost them everything?

Buy on Amazon

Wild Side

by Elsie Silver

Release Date: March 4 2025

I’d always dreamed of my wedding day. But not like this. Not looking into the eyes of the man who betrayed me. But when my nephew’s guardianship is contested, I decide I’ll do whatever it takes to keep him in Rose Hill. Even if it means marrying the enemy.

Buy on Amazon


meghan
